control module¶

Created on Wed Jan 23 17:25:16 2019

@author: draz

control.control_with_battery(t, power, trafo_preload, n_ev)¶

Calculate maximal power possible from the transformer and the sum of the power of all charging points with a connected vehicle.

Parameters

  • t (int) – Current time step.

  • power (float) – Power of each charging point in kW.

  • trafo_preload (list) – Time series data of the transformer preload and maximal load for the simulation period.

  • n_ev (int) – Amount of connected vehicles.

Returns

Maximal power possible from transformer, Sum of the power of all charging points with a connected vehicle.

control.discrimination_free(t, trafo_preload, n_ev)¶

Define the charging power per charging point.

Parameters

  • t (int) – Current time step.

  • trafo_preload (list) – Time series data of the transformer preload for the simulation period.

  • n_ev (int) – Amount of connected vehicles.

Returns

Power that each charging point can load with.

control.first_come_first_served(t, charging_load, trafo_preload)¶

Calculate the maximal charging power possible based on transformer preload and other charging powers.

Parameters

  • t (int) – Current time step.

  • charging_load (float) – Sum of the power of the other charging points that are already assigned.

  • trafo_preload (list) – Time series data of the transformer preload and maximal load for the simulation period.

Returns

Maximal possible charging power.
